entries.content: Starting design session on tool-notification-mockup.html - focusing purely on UI/visual design improvements, not backend complexity. Working with Moti on improving tool notification card designs.

CSS Spinner/Status Indicator Files Audit - Sementix Project

SPINNER FILES LOCATION:
- Directory: C:\projects\semantic-bridge\sementix\src\ui\templates\css\spinners\

INDIVIDUAL SPINNER CSS FILES:
1. spinner-base.css - Base grid layout for spinner showcase
2. spinner-stream.css - Code Stream animation (5 animated bars)
3. spinner-dots.css - Quantum Dots (rotating orbital animation)
4. spinner-pulse.css - Neural Pulse (pulsing ring effect)
5. spinner-ring.css - Execute Ring (multi-layer rotating rings)
6. spinner-helix.css - DNA Helix (double strand animation)
7. spinner-path.css - Circuit Path (SVG-based line drawing)
8. spinner-grid.css - Matrix Grid (3x3 grid fade animation)

TOOL STATUS/STATE CSS FILES:
1. C:\projects\semantic-bridge\sementix\src\ui\templates\css\ui-messages-tool-use.css
   - Main import hub for all tool notification styles
   - Modular system structure with @import statements

2. C:\projects\semantic-bridge\sementix\src\ui\templates\css\ui-messages-tool-use\components\status-indicator.css
   - .tool-status class: 16x16px flex container
   - Used for displaying tool execution state icons

3. C:\projects\semantic-bridge\sementix\src\ui\templates\css\ui-messages-tool-use\components\notification-card.css
   - .tool-notification class: Main notification container
   - data-state attributes: 'start', 'end-success', 'end-error'
   - Uses transition and shine effects

4. C:\projects\semantic-bridge\sementix\src\ui\templates\css\ui-messages-tool-use\components\action-icon.css
   - .tool-action-icon class: 20x20px icon container
   - Data-action variants: read, write, search, execute, analyze
   - Each has gradient background and glow colors

5. C:\projects\semantic-bridge\sementix\src\ui\templates\css\ui-messages-tool-use\states\notification-states.css
   - State-specific styling using [data-state='start'] selectors
   - .tool-action-icon animation: pulse 1.5s on start state
   - Color schemes for different states

6. C:\projects\semantic-bridge\sementix\src\ui\templates\css\ui-messages-tool-use\utilities\animations.css
   - @keyframes spin (1s rotation)
   - @keyframes pulse (opacity fade)
   - @keyframes slideInRight, fadeOut

IMPORT STRUCTURE:
ui-messages-tool-use.css imports:
- ./ui-messages-tool-use/base/layout.css
- ./ui-messages-tool-use/components/notification-card.css
- ./ui-messages-tool-use/components/action-icon.css
- ./ui-messages-tool-use/components/tool-info.css
- ./ui-messages-tool-use/components/status-indicator.css
- ./ui-messages-tool-use/components/badges.css
- ./ui-messages-tool-use/components/tool-group.css
- ./ui-messages-tool-use/states/notification-states.css
- ./ui-messages-tool-use/utilities/animations.css
- ./ui-messages-tool-use/utilities/interactions.css

USAGE IN COMPONENTS:
- EngineStatus.tsx uses .loading-spinner (custom spin animation)
- Tool notifications use .tool-notification wrapper
- .tool-action-icon for action type display
- .tool-status for state indicator (16x16)

Replaced old tool notification spinner system with new 6px colored dot design:
- CSS-only spinners (no emoji characters)
- 3 states: yellow blinking (in-progress), green solid (success), red solid (error)
- Gradient backgrounds with depth/shine effects via ::before pseudo-element
- Smooth 2s pulse-fade animation that goes to full dark
- Updated 4 files: status-indicator.css, animations.css, notification-states.css, ToolIconMapper.js

Completed major cleanup: Removed all action icon functionality from tool notifications. Deleted action-icon.css, cleaned up ToolIconMapper.js (removed all icon methods), updated ToolTemplates.js to only render spinner + tool name. Spinner now positioned on left side. Final layout: [spinner] Tool Name. FileIconService preserved for markdown formatter use.
